MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach, affecting properties in Congleton Road, Newcastle Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:18 AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local area and are investigating reports of third party damage to our network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:30 AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:20 AM on 19th March 2021.
